Description: The following statement contains a magic number: for (int i = 0; i < mesh.VertexCount; i++) {  	//get the vertex content  	var pos = vertices.Read<Vector3> ();  	var norm = vertices.Read<Vector3> ();  	pos.X = (pos.X + meshData.Randomness.X) % 2 - 0;  	pos.Y = (pos.Y + meshData.Randomness.Y) % 2 - 1;  	pos.Z = (pos.Z + meshData.Randomness.Z) % 2 - 0;  	//to write the data move the stream position back!  	vertices.Position -= mesh.BytesPerVertex;  	vertices.Write (pos);  	vertices.Write (norm);  }
